CustomField.formula: IF( SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.CloseDate<DATEVALUE( $Label.Annualize_ACV_Date ), IF( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 12, IF(ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c > 0,ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c,SBQQ__NetAmount__c), (IF(ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c > 0,ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c,SBQQ__NetAmount__c) / SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c)* 12), (IF(ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c > 0,ACV_Bookings_Rollup__c,SBQQ__NetAmount__c) / SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c)* 12 )
CustomField.label: ACV Bookings
